The <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H7534>still<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Now <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of his father <S%H1>David,<s%> <S%H1732>except<s%> he <S%H7534>sacrificed<s%> and <S%H2076>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H6999>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> for that was the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place;<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on that <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

In <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> at <S%H3915>night;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7592>"Ask<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> [you wish] me to <S%H5414>give<s%> you."

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thou hast <S%H6213>shown<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my father, <S%H1>according<s%> as he <S%H9201>walked<s%> <S%H1980>before<s%> Thee in <S%H6440>truth<s%> and <S%H571>righteousness<s%> and <S%H6666>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3483>heart<s%> <S%H3824>toward<s%> Thee; and Thou hast <S%H5973>reserved<s%> for him <S%H8104>this<s%> <S%H2088>great<s%> <S%H1419>lovingkindness,<s%> that Thou hast <S%H2617>given<s%> him a <S%H5414>son<s%> to <S%H1121>sit<s%> on his <S%H3427>throne,<s%> as [it is] <S%H3678>this<s%> <S%H2088>day.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou hast <S%H4427>made<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in <S%H8478>place<s%> of my father <S%H1>David,<s%> yet I am but a <S%H1732>little<s%> <S%H9512>child;<s%> I do not <S%H5288>know<s%> how to <S%H3045>go<s%> out or <S%H3318>come<s%> in.

And it was <S%H3190>pleasing<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> and have not <S%H7592>asked<s%> for yourself <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> for yourself, <S%H3808>nor<s%> have you <S%H7592>asked<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> but have <S%H7592>asked<s%> for yourself <S%H995>discernment<s%> to <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%>

<S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to your <S%H1697>words.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>discerning<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H834>so<s%> that there has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> one <S%H3644>like<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall one <S%H3644>like<s%> you <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you.

"And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> My <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> as your father <S%H1>David<s%> <S%H1732>walked,<s%> then I will <S%H1980>prolong<s%> your <S%H748>days.<s%>"

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3364>awoke,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was a <S%H2472>dream.<s%> And he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> who were <S%H2181>harlots<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> and I <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and I <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H3205>child<s%> <S%H5973>while<s%> she [was] in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> woman's <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> she <S%H7901>lay<s%> on it.

"So she <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H681>beside<s%> me while your <S%H519>maidservant<s%> <S%H3463>slept,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him in her <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> her <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

"And when I <S%H6965>rose<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H3243>nurse<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H4191>dead;<s%> but when I <S%H995>looked<s%> at him <S%H995>carefully<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was not my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I had <S%H3205>borne.<s%>"

Then the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No!<s%> For the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>one<s%> is my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> one is your <S%H1121>son.<s%>" But the <S%H2088>first<s%> <S%H2088>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No!<s%> For the <S%H4191>dead<s%> one is your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>one<s%> is my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" Thus they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Get<s%> me a <S%H2719>sword.<s%>" So they <S%H935>brought<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1504>"Divide<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> in <S%H8147>two,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> to the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> to the <S%H259>other.<s%>"

But the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "He shall be <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> mine <S%H3808>nor<s%> yours; <S%H1504>divide<s%> [him!]"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> the first woman the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3205>child,<s%> and by <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4191>means<s%> <S%H4191>kill<s%> him. She is his <S%H517>mother.<s%>"
